credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: Quickest Way by Air Mail
description: In upper half of sheet, in heavy black line over angular white shape on a slate-blue ground, the abstract rendering of a bird to resemble paper airplane, topped by two puffy white clouds.  In lower half of sheet, close to left mamrgin, in large black capital letters:  QUICKEST WAY BY/; in large red capital letters:  AIR MAIL/; in smaller slate-blue capital letters:  ASK AT YOUR NEAREST POST OFFICE.
name: Poster
